original_text: Both for the shewbread, and for the fine flour for meat offering, and for the unleavened cakes, and for that which is baked in the pan, and for that which is fried, and for all manner of measure and size;
korean_text: 또 진설병과 고운 가루의 소제물 곧 무교전병이나 과자를 굽는 것이나 반죽하는 것이나 또 모든 저울과 자를 맡고

sentences.original_text: and for the fine flour for meat offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 소제를 위한 고운 가루를 위해

sentences.original_text: and for that which is baked in the pan
and for that which is fried
and for all manner of measure and size
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 종류의 양과 크기를 위해
